snippet.title: [TAS] GBA Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow by FractalFusion in 53:17.47
snippet.description:
This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/2222M
TAS originally published on 2012-12-19

Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow is the second game in the Splinter Cell series.  Unlike its predecessor (https://tasvideos.org/935M), you have to pay some heed to the stealth system.  This leads to more creative solutions to many levels.  The author's comments (https://tasvideos.org/1896S) contain many details about the gameplay and routes chosen.
